driver = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="91c5be6ecfa4ab95751b7e453838596d")>

    @allure.title("Test search functionality")
    def test_search_product(driver):
        wait = WebDriverWait(driver, 10)
    
        with allure.step("Navigate to Amazon"):
            driver.get("https://www.amazon.in")
            assert "amazon" in driver.current_url.lower()
    
        with allure.step("Search for keyword"):
            search_box = wait.until(EC.presence_of_element_located((By.ID, "twotabsearchtextbox")))
            search_box.send_keys(keyword, Keys.ENTER)
            time.sleep(2)
            allure.attach(f"Searched for: {keyword}", "Search Term", allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
